channel.title: Kerberos on Notes for Scott Eissfeldt
channel.description: Recent content in Kerberos on Notes for Scott Eissfeldt

item.title: Which-Is-Kerberos-Admin-Server
item.description: To see which keytab server your client is trying to authenticate, you can run these commands. export KRB5_TRACE=/dev/stdout kinit -k -t username.keytab username@EC2.INTERNAL -V
